Actions.Name: Send Command
Actions.Tooltip: Send custom UDP/TCP messages to a target IP and port with each button press. Each press can trigger a different action based on the plugin's current state, allowing for complex, multi-step workflows. Ideal for controlling networked devices or software in real-time.

Author: Zayik
Name: CommandSender
Description: This plugin serves as a powerful and versatile tool for streamers and content creators, enabling them to send custom messages over both UDP and TCP protocols to a specified IP address and port. This functionality allows for real-time communication and control over networked devices or software, directly from the Stream Deck interface. In addition to its networking capabilities, the plugin features a stateful design. This means that each button press can trigger a different action based on the current state of the plugin. This allows users to create complex, multi-step workflows and interactions, all from a single button on their Stream Deck. Whether you're controlling lighting, managing your streaming software, or interacting with other networked devices, this plugin offers a level of customization and control that can significantly enhance your streaming setup and workflow.
